/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings. The perspective of the image gives a comprehensive view of the cityscape, showcasing the architectural diversity and natural beauty of Beijing.
